info_points.name: Olympus Mons
info_points.description: Olympus Mons is a large shield volcano on Mars. It is over 21.9 km high as measured by the Mars Orbiter Laser Altimeter, about 2.5 times the elevation of Mount Everest above sea level.

info_points.name: North Polar Ice Cap
info_points.description: The bulk of the northern ice cap consists of water ice; it also has a thin seasonal veneer of dry ice, solid carbon dioxide. Each winter the ice cap grows by adding 1.5 to 2m of dry ice.
